attributes.action: find the £50bn to enable the EU to run on Saharan solar power
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Scientists think that the Sahara can provide huge amounts of solar electricity. The Prime Minister acted decisively to save the banks because they are a bedrock of British society. We want him to act with similar decisiveness to avert the climate crunch by leading an EU coalition to generate electricity for Europe and Africa
